update PRM_TASK
TASK_NO = #{task_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTID = #{postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTID_NAME = #{postid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLANID = #{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLANID_NAME = #{planid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLSTATUS = #{billstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_TIME = #{assign_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id}

update PRM_TASK set TASK_NO = #{task_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTID = #{postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTID_NAME = #{postid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANID = #{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANID_NAME = #{planid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLSTATUS = #{billstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGN_TIME = #{assign_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id}
